LanguageData.BrushTurkey.label: brush turkey
LanguageData.BrushTurkey.description: It is a large bird with black feathers and a red head. Despite its name and their superficial similarities, the bird is not closely related to American turkeys.
LanguageData.BrushTurkey.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.BrushTurkey.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.BrushTurkey.tools.head.label: head
